A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went into this movie as a Star Wars fan\, I enjoyed TFA and am a huge fan of the OT. I felt that the movie started with a plodding drag that I just couldn't get past\, but then the story built and built and built until everything came to a head in a wonderful way. 

The overwhelming feelings of disappointment\, loss and failure piled on until that bright "Rey" of hope shined brightly at the end. 

I cannot wait to go back and see it again.
